items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he thought it wouldn\'t be good if she went there by herself.
Tom wondered what Mary would say when she found out he\'d spent all their money.
Tom\'s car is easily recognizable since there is a big dent in the front bumper.
Tom can\'t afford to eat at that kind of restaurant so let\'s go somewhere else.
Tom did everything he could to stop Mary from doing what she was planning to do.
